com.model.bodies

Class ProjectileBody

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.Body
      • com.model.bodies.EntityBody
        • com.model.bodies.ProjectileBody

  • public class ProjectileBody
extends EntityBody
    Extrends EntityBody, creates the Projectile's fixture and sets it's collision filters.

      ProjectileBody(com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.World world, ProjectileController model)

      • ProjectileBody

        public ProjectileBody(com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.World world,

        Creates a body for a Projectile, based on a Model, as well as it's fixture.
        Parameters:
        world - needed for EntityBody's constructor.
        model - Model with which the body is going to be associated with.
